message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000. This is a great deal, considering the product is worth $12,000 to you. I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.
Alice, your offer is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $12,000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for me. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I understand that $18,000 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $16,000. This is a great compromise, considering the product's value to you is $12,000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Alice, $16,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's my absolute limit.  It's a good price for you as well, as you're getting more than what you value it at. Let's try to reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate! I'm willing to meet you at $15,000, which is still a good profit for me considering the product's value to you. I'm willing to compromise to get a deal done. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
